stunt.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a dangerous action that is done to entertain people, especially in a film
stunt.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Not many actors do their own stunts.
stunt.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: something that is done to attract people’s attention, especially in advertising or politics
stunt.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Todd flew over the city in a hot-air balloon as a publicity stunt.
stunt.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to stop something or someone from growing to their full size or developing properly
stunt.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Lack of sunlight will stunt the plant’s growth.
stunt.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: something that is done to attract people’s attention to a product or company
stunt.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: The companies turned the event into a publicity stunt.
They deliberately created a controversial commercial as a stunt to get free publicity.
